A muddy affair with cyclo-cross

US drone strike in Pakistan kills 5

Two Pakistani intelligence officials say that missiles from an American drone have killed five militants in their hideout in a northwestern tribal area. The officials say two missiles were fired from the unmanned spy aircraft.
